pci_ai_dashboard_cli_description: Use our ovhai interface to access and manage your notebooks, jobs and applications in command lines (CLI).
pci_ai_dashboard_cli_install_restart_ter: Be sure to restart your machine so that you can use ovhai.
pci_ai_dashboard_cli_auth_title_text: Authentication on the platform can be done via any users and AI tokens configured within the same Public Cloud project.
pci_ai_dashboard_cli_auth_steps: The authentication steps are as follows:
pci_ai_dashboard_cli_auth_steps_step_2: select authentication type in terminal or via browser
pci_ai_dashboard_cli_auth_steps_step_3: enter the userâ€™s login details or their associated token
pci_ai_dashboard_cli_commands_desc: Launch {{command}} to get a list of available actions.
